languages.text: "Хейнрикс, самое время воспользоваться привилегиями твоего статуса. Ты ведь не хочешь прервать свою миссию на несколько циклов?

traits.locale_text: "Хейнрикс, самое время воспользоваться привелегиями твоего статуса. Ты ведь не хочешь прервать свою миссию на несколько циклов?

languages.text: "Heinrix, this is a perfect opportunity to make use of your privileged status. After all, you do not wish to suspend your mission for several cycles, do you?"
languages.original_text: "Хейнрикс, самое время воспользоваться привилегиями твоего статуса. Ты ведь не хочешь прервать свою миссию на несколько циклов?

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix, this is a perfect opportunity to make use of your privileged status. After all, you do not wish to suspend your mission for several cycles, do you?"
"Heinrix, this is a perfect opportunity to make use of your privileged status. After all, you do not wish to suspend your mission for several cycles, do you?"
"Heinrix, this is a perfect opportunity to make use of your privileged status. After all, you do not wish to suspend your mission for several cycles, do you?"
"Heinrix, this is a perfect opportunity to make use of your privileged status. After all, you do not wish to suspend your mission for several cycles, do you?"

languages.text: “海因里希，这种时候该轮到你的特权发挥作用了。毕竟，你也不希望你的任务耽搁好几个周期，是吧？”
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, this is a perfect opportunity to make use of your privileged status. After all, you do not wish to suspend your mission for several cycles, do you?"

traits.locale_text: “海因里希，这种时候该轮到你的特权发挥作用了。毕竟，你也不希望你的任务耽搁好几个周期，是吧？”

languages.text: «Heinrix, esta es una oportunidad perfecta para utilizar sus privilegios. Al fin y al cabo, usted tampoco querrá dejar su misión a un lado durante ciclos, ¿me equivoco?».
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, this is a perfect opportunity to make use of your privileged status. After all, you do not wish to suspend your mission for several cycles, do you?"

traits.locale_text: «Heinrix, esta es una oportunidad perfecta para utilizar sus privilegios. Al fin y al cabo, usted tampoco querrá dejar su misión a un lado durante ciclos, ¿me equivoco?».

languages.text: 「ハインリックス、お前の特権的な地位を活用するのに最適な機会だ。結局のところ、お前だって数周期もの間、聖務の歩みを止めたくはないだろう？」
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, this is a perfect opportunity to make use of your privileged status. After all, you do not wish to suspend your mission for several cycles, do you?"

traits.locale_text: 「ハインリックス、お前の特権的な地位を活用するのに最適な機会だ。結局のところ、お前だって数周期もの間、聖務の歩みを止めたくはないだろう？」

languages.text: « Heinrix, c'est l'occasion idéale de mettre à profit votre statut privilégié. Je présume que vous n'avez aucune envie de suspendre votre mission pendant plusieurs cycles, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, this is a perfect opportunity to make use of your privileged status. After all, you do not wish to suspend your mission for several cycles, do you?"

traits.locale_text: « Heinrix, c'est l'occasion idéale de mettre à profit votre statut privilégié. Je présume que vous n'avez aucune envie de suspendre votre mission pendant plusieurs cycles, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: "Heinrix, das ist eine perfekte Gelegenheit, um Euren privilegierten Status zu nutzen. Oder wollt Ihr etwa Eure Mission für mehrere Zyklen unterbrechen?"
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, this is a perfect opportunity to make use of your privileged status. After all, you do not wish to suspend your mission for several cycles, do you?"

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix, das ist eine perfekte Gelegenheit, um Euren privilegierten Status zu nutzen. Oder wollt Ihr etwa Eure Mission für mehrere Zyklen unterbrechen?"

languages.text: "Heinrix, imtiyazlarından faydalanmanın tam sırası. Sonuçta birkaç döngülüğüne görevine ara vermek istemezsin, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, this is a perfect opportunity to make use of your privileged status. After all, you do not wish to suspend your mission for several cycles, do you?"

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix, imtiyazlarından faydalanmanın tam sırası. Sonuçta birkaç döngülüğüne görevine ara vermek istemezsin, değil mi?"
